contentrichtext.text: '''Gunnar Johansson''' (born 1911, died 1998) was a [[Sweden|Swedish]] [[Psychophysics|psychophysicist]]. He was interested in the [[Gestalt psychology|Gestalt laws]] of [[motion perception]] in [[visual perception|vision]]. He is best known for his investigations of [[biological motion]].<ref>{{cite journal| author=G. Johansson | title=Visual perception of biological motion and a model for its analysis | journal=Percept. Psychophys. | volume=14 | year=1973 | pages=201–211 | doi=10.3758/BF03212378}}</ref><ref>{{cite journal| author=G. Johansson | title=Spatio-temporal differentiation and integration in visual motion perception | journal=Percept. Res. | volume=38 | year=1976 | pages=379–393}}</ref> He helped develop the rigidity assumption which posits that proximal stimuli that can be perceived as rigid objects are generally perceived as such. Johansson received his Ph.D. from the [[Stockholm University College]] in 1950, on the thesis ''Configurations in event perception''.<ref>Johansson, Gunnar, ''Configurations in event perception: an experimental study'', Diss. Stockholm : Högskolan, Stockholm, 1950 - [http://libris.kb.se/bib/843279 Libris record]</ref> He was professor of psychology at [[Uppsala University]] from 1957 to 1977. In 1970, he was elected a member of the [[Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences]]. == References == * {{cite book |title=Perceiving events and objects |last=Johansson |first=Gunnar |coauthors=Sten Sture Bergström, William Epstein |year=1994 |publisher=Lawrence Erlbaum Associates |isbn=978-0-8058-1555-9 |url=http://books.google.ca/books?id=pFQWr7hIRigC&dq=Gunnar+Johansson|accessdate=2009-09-22}} {{Reflist}} {{Authority control|VIAF=51661541}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Johansson, Gunnar | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Swedish psychologist | DATE OF BIRTH = 1911 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1998 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Johansson, Gunnar}} [[Category:Swedish psychologists]] [[Category:Stockholm University alumni]] [[Category:Uppsala University faculty]] [[Category:Members of the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences]] [[Category:1911 births]] [[Category:1998 deaths]] {{Sweden-academic-bio-stub}} {{psychologist-stub}}
